entry.title: é›…æ€å£è¯­
entry.content:
é›…æ€å£è¯­

Talk about your free time

The styles of hobbies

Indoor activities

Chilling out /hanging out with friends

outdoor activities

traveling/ gardening /aports

collecting thins

stamps /coins /nfts=non-fungible token(a unique item)

Creative activities

playing a musical instrument /paiting /knitting / taking photos

Express

  • I get up to a lot of things = do an activity
  • like doing

/ to do ğŸ¡ª it`s a choice or habit

  • I`m fond of/ into/ passionate about playing video games

I like to dabble in cooking -> to do sth casually, less seriously

I play the guitar but I am just an aficionado/ amateur

  • I paint whenever I can / as often as I can /whenever I get a chance

I donâ€™t get round to painting as much as I would like

  • I recently took up painting -> start
  • I am new to it
  • I started painting a couple of years ago

I decided to have a go at painting -> to try sth new

I decided to try my hand at painting

  • I`ve been playing football for as long as I can remenber

I`ve been painting for donkey`s years -> for a long time

// Class.forName(â€œcom.mysql.jdbc.Driverâ€); 

    //2\. è·å–è¿æ¥ é»˜è®¤ä¸»æœºå¯ç®€å†™  å»æ‰çº¢å­—      String url = __"jdbc:mysql:///db1?useSSL=false"__;      String username = __"root"__;      String password = __"abc123"__;      Connection conn = DriverManager\.getConnection\(url, username, password\);      //3\. å®šä¹‰SQL      String sql = __"select __\*__ from stu"__;      //4\. è·å–statementå¯¹è±¡      Statement stmt = conn\.createStatement\(\);      //5\. æ‰§è¡Œsql      ResultSet rs = stmt\.executeQuery\(sql\);      //åˆ›å»ºé›†åˆ      ArrayList<Object> list = __new __ArrayList<>\(\);      //6\. å¤„ç†ç»“æœï¼Œéå†rsçš„æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®      //  6\.1 å…‰æ ‡å‘ä¸‹ç§»åŠ¨ä¸€è¡Œå¹¶åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•°æ®      __while __\(rs\.next\(\)\)\{          Account account = __new __Account\(\);          //6\.2 è·å–æ•°æ® getXxx\(\)

// int id = rs.getInt(1);
// String name = rs.getString(2);
// int age = rs.getInt(3); 

        __int __id = rs\.getInt\(__"id"__\);          String name = rs\.getString\(__"name"__\);          __int __age = rs\.getInt\(__"age"__\);          //èµ‹å€¼          account\.setId\(id\);          account\.setName\(name\);          account\.setAge\(age\);          //å­˜å…¥é›†åˆ          list\.add\(account\);      \}      System\.__out__\.println\(list\);  \}
__package __com.itheima.jdbc;
__import __org.junit.Test;

__import __java.sql.*;

__public class __Demo5_PreparedStatement { 

@Test  __public void __testPreparedStatement\(\) __throws __Exception \{      *//2\. è·å–è¿æ¥ é»˜è®¤ä¸»æœºå¯ç®€å†™  å»æ‰çº¢å­—      *String url = __"jdbc:mysql:///db1?useSSL=false"__;      String username = __"root"__;      String password = __"abc123"__;      Connection conn = DriverManager\.*getConnection*\(url, username, password\);      *//æ¥å—ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥ ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç       *String name = __"zhangsansfrere"__;      String pwd = __"' or '1' = '1"__;

//å®šä¹‰sql
String sql = __â€select __*__ from tb_user where username = ? and password = ?â€__; 

    *//è·å–pstmtå¯¹è±¡      *PreparedStatement pstmt = conn\.prepareStatement\(sql\);      *//è®¾ç½®ï¼Ÿçš„å€¼      *pstmt\.setString\(1,name\);      pstmt\.setString\(2,pwd\);      *//æ‰§è¡Œsql      *ResultSet re = pstmt\.executeQuery\(\);      *//åˆ¤æ–­ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ\-rsé‡Œé¢æœ‰æ•°æ®å³å¯      *__if __\(re\.next\(\)\)\{          System\.__*out*__\.println\(__"ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸï¼"__\);      \}__else __\{          System\.__*out*__\.println\(__"ç™»å½•æ˜¯å§"__\);      \}

*// //7. é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº

conn.close();
}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
